kreport.name: spForecloseRate_zh

condition.name: deptId
condition.extend: select v_o.id,v_o.org_name from v_org v_o where v_o.type='分公司' and v_o.area in(${s@user_areas}) order by v_o.type_order,v_o.org_order

condition.name: area
condition.extend: select d.dvalue,d.dname from sys_data_dictionary d where d.dgroup='区域' order by d.ordernum

condition.name: earea
condition.extend: select d.dvalue,d.dname from sys_data_dictionary d where d.dgroup='区域' and d.dvalue in (${s@user_areas}) and d.dvalue>=20 and d.dvalue<800 order by d.ordernum

data.tbody: ${0} ${1} ${2} ${3} ${4} ${5} ${6} ${7} ${8}

kreport.ksql: --直接回单清单 select distinct o2.org_name 分公司, f.serialno 工单编号, f.title 工单标题, to_char(f.gendate,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi') 报障时间, i.organiger 报障人, i.organigerdept 报障部门, rend(i.area) 区域, i.faultdescription 故障描述 from rec_flow f,ins_frm_fault i,rec_node n,sec_org o1,v_org o2 where f.flowlsh=i.flowlsh and f.flowlsh=n.flowlsh and f.status!='XJ' and n.nodecode='8706e7770a11226800104dac10cfa517' --业务支持中心接口 and n.status='YB' and not exists( select 1 from rec_node n1,rec_node n2 where n1.flowlsh=f.flowlsh and n2.flowlsh=f.flowlsh and n1.nodelsh=n2.prenodelsh and n2.preroutecode in( '8717ba290a11226801f1ea7abee4bbda', --转IT分部处理 '79ee8e340a112268004c0965a97dbc33', --转省IT中心 '567826fd0a11221101bc22da16533a66', --派电子运维 '976907b60a112211003ceb07043bfc89' --派厂家 ) ) and o1.id=n.executergrouporgid and o2.org_code=substr(o1.org_code,1,8) #[and f.startercode ${startercode}] #[and f.startercode=${type10000}] #[and i.area=${area}] #[and i.replytime>=${startDate}] #[and i.replytime<${endDate}] #[and o2.org_name=${org_name}] and o2.type='分公司' #[and o2.id=${deptId}] #[and o2.area=${earea}] #[--${earea}]#[and o2.area in(${s@user_areas})]
